CustomField.description: Text based on the Payee Type for: Employee, Payor, Bank, and Fee reimbursement
CustomField.formula: CASE ( Payee__r.Payee_Type__c, "Employee", "THE ENCLOSED CHECK WAS COLLECTED ON YOUR BEHALF BY THE CALIFORNIA LABOR COMMISSIONER. IT MAY BE A GROSS AMOUNT AND YOU MAY HAVE TAX OBLIGATIONS AS A RESULT OF RECEIVING THIS PAYMENT. YOU SHOULD CONSULT WITH YOUR TAX ADVISOR REGARDING ANY TAX IMPLICATIONS. BY CASHING THIS CHECK, YOU AGREE TO ASSUME ALL TAX LIABILITIES ON THIS PAYMENT.", "Employee - Net Wages", "THE ENCLOSED CHECK REPRESENTS WAGES COLLECTED ON YOUR BEHALF BY THE CALIFORNIA LABOR COMMISSIONER’S OFFICE. THIS CHECK IS A NET AMOUNT WITH AUTHORIZED DEDUCTIONS MADE BY YOUR EMPLOYER. YOU SHOULD CONSULT WITH YOUR TAX ADVISER REGARDING ANY TAX IMPLICATIONS. BY CASHING THIS CHECK, YOU AGREE TO ASSUME ALL TAX LIABILITIES ON THIS PAYMENT.", "Payor", "THE ENCLOSED CHECK IS A REFUND OF AN OVERPAYMENT OR A REJECTION OF YOUR SETTLEMENT PAYMENT THAT HAS BEEN RECEIVED BY THE CALIFORNIA LABOR COMMISSIONER. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS REGARDING THIS PAYMENT, PLEASE CONTACT THE DEPUTY/INVESTIGATOR ASSIGNED.", "State", "THE ENCLOSED CHECK IS PAYMENT FOR FEE REIMBURSEMENT COLLECTED BY THE CALIFORNIA LABOR COMMISSIONER AS A RESULT OF JUDGMENT ENFORCEMENT EFFORTS. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE CONTACT THE LOCAL LABOR COMMISSIONER’S OFFICE.", "Bank", "THE ENCLOSED CHECK REPRESENTS A REPLACEMENT FOR A RETURNED ITEM. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE CONTACT THE CALIFORNIA LABOR COMMISSIONER’S CENTRALIZED CASHIERING UNIT AT (916)263-2893.", "")
CustomField.label: Payee Type Text
